title: Start Your Ruby Podcast Today!
description: Talk I gave with Jason Charnes and Chris Oliver going through the lessons and advice we had for starting and maintaining a successful podcast.

title: Podcast Panel from Railsconf 2022
description: Railsconf is back in person! We sat down live to record awith Jemma Issroff, Brittany Martin, Robby Russel, Andrew Culver, Nicholas Schwaderer, and Colleen Schnettler to discuss everything Ruby on Rails.

title: Episode 1 - Andrew Mason
event: Code and the Coding Coders who Code it
description: I join Drew Bragg for the first episode of his new podcast to discuss ADHD, workflows, Bridgetown, and more.

title: Special Guests: Andrew Mason and Collin Jilbert!
description: Collin Jilbert and I join the Rubber Duck Dev duo to talk

title: Special Guest: Andrew Mason!
description: A chill convo about the Remote Ruby podcast, Ruby Radar and other Ruby goodness!

title: ViewComponents in Action with Andrew Mason
description: I join Brittany Martin for a conversation primarily focused on how I was implementing ViewComponent at CodeFund.

title: Joined by Andrew Mason
description: I share my path to programming through graphic design, as well as how I joined Ruby Rogues, became involved with open source, became invested in the Ruby community, and more.

title: Two Docker Noobs Talk About Docker
description: A long, rambling, undisciplined discussion of a number of things including Jason Swett's and I's respective experiences with Docker.

title: MRS 074: Andrew Mason
description: I am introduced as the newest panelist for Ruby Rogues and share my background and how I got into computer programming.

title: Testing Q&A with Listener Andrew Mason
description: As a listener and junior Rails developer, I come on the show to ask some questions about Rails testing.

title: Andrew Mason: I Expected College To Be Basically Boot Camp
event: Computer Science: Just the Useful Bits
description: Noah Gibbs and I talk about the prison and court systems, why FTP is a terrible protocol, reading code, ADHD and a lot more.
